metadata.Title: CVE-2022-44571 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: There is a denial of service vulnerability in the Content-Dispositionparsingcomponent of Rack fixed in 2.0.9.2, 2.1.4.2, 2.2.4.1, 3.0.0.1. Thiscould allow an attacker to craft an input that can causeContent-Disposition header parsing in Rackto take an unexpected amount oftime, possibly resulting in a denial ofservice attack vector. This headeris used typically used in multipartparsing. Any applications that parsemultipart posts using Rack (virtuallyall Rails applications) are impacted.

criterions.comment: ruby-rack: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
